author: ias
msg: Modified call to pass character encoding of request to message context in order to support synchronization between request and response.

author: ias
msg: Changed startElement to get character encoding from message context first.

author: ias
msg: Added support of synchronization between request and response.

author: ias
msg: Bug fix - read() and peek() should return a value >=0 except EOF.
Note: UTF-16 uses FE FF or FF FE as Byte Order Mark and FF-> -1 as byte is not EOF.

author: ias
msg: Added a test case for synchronization between request and response.
